description: This file defines API functions for accessing recipe data, including fetching all recipes, fetching a single recipe by ID, and retrieving all recipe IDs. It also includes utility functions such as simulating API latency.

methods.name: async function sleep(ms = 25) { sleep
methods.description: Simulates API latency by delaying execution for a specified number of milliseconds.

methods.name: export async function getRecipes(): Promise<Recipe[]> { getRecipes
methods.description: Fetches all recipes, adding a dynamic cookTime property to each.

methods.name: export async function getRecipeById(id: string): Promise<Recipe | undefined> { getRecipeById
methods.description: Fetches a recipe by its unique ID, adding a cookTime property if found.

methods.name: export function getAllRecipeIds() { getAllRecipeIds
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all recipe IDs.

ctags.name: getRecipeById
ctags.pattern: /^export async function getRecipeById(id: string): Promise<Recipe | undefined> {$/
